header.name: Richard Bobik
header.title: Full Stack Software Engineer / Developer
header.bio: Passionate and results-driven software engineer with solid experience in application development, testing, and system enhancement. Skilled at working independently as well as in agile team environments. Committed to continuous learning and expanding technical expertise. Motivated by a desire to build scalable, user-centric software that solves real-world problems.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.description: Here’s a selection of personal programming projects I’ve worked on. Click on the links to see live demos or explore the code on GitHub.
